**2023-06-14 / @aclements, @adonovan, @andybons, @bradfitz, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @rsc**

- **cmd/go: GOAMD64=local to compile for local machine** [#60338](https://go.dev/issue/60338)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto/tls: expose SessionState extra information** [#60539](https://go.dev/issue/60539)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **MIPS32: pass ISA level with GOMIPS** [#59415](https://go.dev/issue/59415)
  - duplicate of #60072
- **fmt: add Formatter fallback** [#51195](https://go.dev/issue/51195)
  - declined in favor of #51668
- **go/doc: add illustrations to documentation pages** [#39513](https://go.dev/issue/39513)
  - declined based on #51082 discussion
- **go/printer: don't reformat single line switch cases** [#57667](https://go.dev/issue/57667)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **math/rand: Expose constructor for \`lockedSource\`** [#24121](https://go.dev/issue/24121)
  - declined in favor of #54880
